Description: Agate bead; long pellet-shaped body perforated for suspension though the long axis; surface polished; stone cracked and both the holes are worn and chipped.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.120, Tomb 108)
